detectors.description:
AKcoin.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AKcoin.sol#54-66) has assert violation
	Assert violations:
	- assert(bool)(_val <= holders[_from]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AKcoin.sol#58)
	- assert(bool)(_val <= approach[_from][msg.sender]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AKcoin.sol#60)
	- assert(bool)(holders[_to] >= _val) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AKcoin.sol#63)

AKcoin.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AKcoin.sol#33-35) logic is abnormal, abnormal termination statement:
	- revert()() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AKcoin.sol#34)
detectors.markdown:
[AKcoin.fallback()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AKcoin.sol#L33-L35) logic is abnormal, abnormal termination statement:
	- [revert()()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AKcoin.sol#L34)

detectors.description:
